message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you is at least $12000. To ensure we both achieve a fair transaction, I am offering it to you for $10000. This price reflects the high value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further details.
